input_data.title: Ironside
input_data.overview:
Ironside is a Universal television series that ran on NBC from September 14, 1967 to January 16, 1975. The show starred Raymond Burr as a paraplegic Chief of Detectives, Robert T. Ironside. The character debuted on March 28, 1967 in a TV movie. When broadcast in the United Kingdom the show was initially titled A Man Called Ironside. The show earned Burr six Emmy and two Golden Globe nominations.

A new television series having the same name, Ironside is currently under development and is scheduled to debut on October 2, 2013.

response.analytical_summary: Ironside is a police procedural drama centered on a paraplegic police chief who continues to solve crimes despite his physical limitations. The series blends elements of crime investigation with a focus on character development and social commentary, exploring themes of disability, justice, and leadership. The show's unique premise and Raymond Burr's compelling performance contributed to its popularity and longevity. Ironside offers a blend of suspenseful crime-solving and a nuanced portrayal of a man overcoming adversity.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series follows Robert T. Ironside, the former New York City Police Commissioner who, after being shot and paralyzed, is convinced to return to the force as a consultant. He assembles a team of detectives, including his former colleagues, to assist him in solving crimes. Each episode typically involves a new case, with Ironside utilizing his sharp intellect and extensive knowledge of criminal behavior to guide the investigation. Recurring themes involve Ironside's struggle to adapt to his new circumstances, his complex relationships with his team, and his ongoing battle to prove that he remains a capable and effective leader. While the series maintains a procedural format, it also explores Ironside's personal journey and his efforts to maintain a sense of purpose and connection in a world that has changed dramatically.
response.keyword_sentence: Ironside is a serious crime drama set in New York City, exploring themes of justice and leadership through the story of a paraplegic police chief who continues to solve crimes with his team.
